title: Debug Login Page Issue
description: Users are reporting difficulties when attempting to log in to the application. This task is to investigate and debug the login page issue to identify the root cause and implement a solution.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Review existing database queries in your application.Identify frequently executed queries and those with high resource usage.Use database profiling tools to analyze query performance.

title: Test Mobile Responsiveness
description: Verify and ensure that the website/application displays and functions correctly on a variety of mobile devices. The goal is to guarantee a consistent and user-friendly experience for users accessing the platform from smartphones and tablets.

title: Refactor CSS Styles
description: Combine redundant styles and organize them logically to reduce duplication and make the stylesheet more modular.
